column2: [This.GetBestName] wishes to ensure [This.GetHerHis] dynasty can be the power behind the throne by becoming Grand Chancellor.
[This.GetBestName] seeks fame and fortune through the writing of a number of high-quality books.
Has personally written books with a combined artifact quality of 10 or more.
[This.GetBestName] seeks to unlock the secrets of immortality, like many other [taoist.GetBestName] faithful.
